name: The Path of Energy
description:
- 100 levels to test your logic
- 300 balls of energy to recover
- The difficulty increases and several new concepts appear through the levels

Do you have what it takes to find the path of energy?

How to play?
---
The goal is to pick up all the energy in the level and exit through the pipe by guiding the ball with the arrows. When you have placed your arrows, you can summon the ball by touching the beacon. If the ball does not touch any arrow, it will only be affected by gravity. Once the ball is in play, it’s no longer possible to move the arrows, but it’s possible to press the beacon to reset the level.

Play without frustration
---
We know that there is nothing worse than getting stuck in a level and not being able to continue. To avoid this frustration, it's possible to view the solution after 5 unsuccessful attempts in a level.

Features:
--> Intriguing gameplay
--> Multiple levels
--> Interesting in-game physics
--> Challenging levels
--> Simple and easy game controls
--> Suitable for all age groups

Share it with your friends and family members to have a lot of fun playing this game together.

Have fun.
